reviewtext: I purchased this CF Modem card to use with my Ipaq 3600 series pocket pc.  It works Great!  The unit came with the modem, phone cable, and a small instruction manual.I followed the instruction manual to configure my dial-up connection and email settings.  Everything worked great.  It was also nice to see a chart at the back of the book noting DNS settings for the larger ISP's.I have been using the modem for a little over a week now.  I have had no problems and am very satisfied.
